entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
